execution_plan.description: Count receipts per customer and keep only customers with more than 10 visits.
execution_plan.query: SELECT CustomerId, COUNT(*) AS visits FROM receipts GROUP BY CustomerId HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;

execution_plan.description: Fetch last names of customers whose id appears in the result of step 1 (customers with more than 10 visits).
execution_plan.query: SELECT id, lastname FROM customers WHERE id IN ($step1.CustomerId);
